warnings: Warnings For external use only. Flammable keep away from fire or flame. When using this product do not use in or near eyes, if contact occurs, flush thoroughly with water. Stop use and contact a doctor if irritation or redness persists for more than 72 hours.
dosage_administration: Directions • remove and unfold wipe •wet hands thoroughly with product and let air dry
indications: Uses • for hand sanitizing to decrease bacteria on skin when water and soap are not avaliable • recommended for repeated use
